actions.name: CreateConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a configuration set

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to create a configuration set event destination

actions.name: CreateDedicatedIpPool
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new pool of dedicated IP addresses

actions.name: CreateDeliverabilityTestReport
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new predictive inbox placement test

actions.name: CreateEmailIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to start the process of verifying an email identity

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing configuration set

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an event destination

actions.name: DeleteDedicatedIpPool
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a dedicated IP pool

actions.name: DeleteEmailIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an email identity that you previously verified

actions.name: GetAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the email-sending status and capabilities

actions.name: GetBlacklistReports
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the deny lists on which your dedicated IP addresses appear

actions.name: GetConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an existing configuration set

actions.name: GetConfigurationSetEventDestinations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of event destinations that are associated with a configuration set

actions.name: GetDedicatedIp
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a dedicated IP address

actions.name: GetDedicatedIps
actions.description: Grants permission to list the dedicated IP addresses that are associated with your account

actions.name: GetDeliverabilityDashboardOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to get the status of the Deliverability dashboard

actions.name: GetDeliverabilityTestReport
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the results of a predictive inbox placement test

actions.name: GetDomainDeliverabilityCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the deliverability data for a specific campaign

actions.name: GetDomainStatisticsReport
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve inbox placement and engagement rates for the domains that you use to send email

actions.name: GetEmailIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a specific identity associated with your account

actions.name: ListConfigurationSets
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the configuration sets associated with your account

actions.name: ListDedicatedIpPools
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the dedicated IP pools that exist in your account

actions.name: ListDeliverabilityTestReports
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the predictive inbox placement tests that you've performed, regardless of their statuses

actions.name: ListDomainDeliverabilityCampaigns
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve deliverability data for all the campaigns that used a specific domain to send email during a specified time range

actions.name: ListEmailIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the email identities that are associated with your account

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the tags (keys and values) that are associated with a specific resource

actions.name: PutAccountDedicatedIpWarmupAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the automatic warm-up feature for dedicated IP addresses

actions.name: PutAccountSendingAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the ability of your account to send email

actions.name: PutConfigurationSetDeliveryOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a configuration set with a dedicated IP pool

actions.name: PutConfigurationSetReputationOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable collection of reputation metrics for emails that you send using a particular configuration set

actions.name: PutConfigurationSetSendingOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable email sending for messages that use a particular configuration set

actions.name: PutConfigurationSetTrackingOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to specify a custom domain to use for open and click tracking elements in email that you send using a particular configuration set

actions.name: PutDedicatedIpInPool
actions.description: Grants permission to move a dedicated IP address to an existing dedicated IP pool

actions.name: PutDedicatedIpWarmupAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable dedicated IP warm up attributes

actions.name: PutDeliverabilityDashboardOption
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the Deliverability dashboard

actions.name: PutEmailIdentityDkimAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable DKIM authentication for an email identity

actions.name: PutEmailIdentityFeedbackAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable feedback forwarding for an identity

actions.name: PutEmailIdentityMailFromAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the custom MAIL FROM domain configuration for an email identity

actions.name: SendEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to send an email message

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags (keys and values) to a specified resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags (keys and values) from a specified resource

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of an event destination for a configuration set
